pageTitle: DIVERSIFIED ROYALTY CORP (DIV:Toronto): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4844=Diversified Royalty Corp., a multi-royalty corporation, engages in the acquisition of royalties from multi-location businesses and franchisors in North America. The company was formerly known as BENEV Capital Inc. and changed its name to Diversified Royalty Corp. in October 2014. Diversified Royalty Corp. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada., 7810=Diversified Royalty Corp. announced that Jason Granger will step down as DIV’s Chief Financial Officer and Corporate Secretary effective August 31, 2015 to pursue other opportunities., 9067=Diversified Royalty Corp. Presents at CIBC Retail & Consumer Small Cap Forum, Jun-18-2015 01:15 PM. Venue: CIBC Offices, 199 Bay Street, 56th floor, Toronto, Ontario, Canada., 8359=Diversified Royalty Corp. announced that its board of directors has approved a cash dividend of $0.0157 per common share for the period of July 1, 2015 to July 31, 2015, which is equal to $0.1884 per common share on an annualized basis. The dividend will be paid on July 31, 2015 to shareholders of record on July 24, 2015.}
